name: Nodify

scripts.electron:dev: cross-env ELECTRON=true NODE_ENV=development npx concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on tcp:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run prepare-ffmpeg && cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-builder
scripts.copy-ffmpeg:win: if not exist resources\ffmpeg\win mkdir resources\ffmpeg\win && copy /Y "node_modules\ffmpeg-static\ffmpeg.exe" resources\ffmpeg\win\
scripts.copy-ffmpeg:mac: mkdir -p resources/ffmpeg/mac && cp "$(npm root)/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg" resources/ffmpeg/mac/ && chmod +x resources/ffmpeg/mac/ffmpeg
scripts.copy-ffmpeg:linux: mkdir -p resources/ffmpeg/linux && cp "$(npm root)/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg" resources/ffmpeg/linux/ && chmod +x resources/ffmpeg/linux/ffmpeg
scripts.copy-ffprobe:win: if not exist resources\ffprobe\win mkdir resources\ffprobe\win && copy /Y "node_modules\@ffprobe-installer\win32-x64\ffprobe.exe" resources\ffprobe\win\
scripts.copy-ffprobe:mac: mkdir -p resources/ffprobe/mac && cp "$(npm root)/@ffprobe-installer/darwin-x64/ffprobe" resources/ffprobe/mac/ && chmod +x resources/ffprobe/mac/ffprobe
scripts.copy-ffprobe:linux: mkdir -p resources/ffprobe/linux && cp "$(npm root)/@ffprobe-installer/linux-x64/ffprobe" resources/ffprobe/linux/ && chmod +x resources/ffprobe/linux/ffprobe
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run setup-icons:win && npm run prepare-ffmpeg:win && cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run setup-icons:mac && npm run prepare-ffmpeg && cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run setup-icons:linux && npm run prepare-ffmpeg && cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.setup-icons:win: if not exist build\icons mkdir build\icons

description: An AI-powered note-taking and transcription app
